sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { InvoiceDetails } from "./InvoiceDetails"; import { services } from "../../service-card-component/services"; import { HiDocumentAdd } from "react-icons/hi"; import { MdDeleteForever } from "react-icons/md"; import "./invoice.styles.css"; const newInvoice = { invoiceNumber: 1, id: Math.round(Math.random() * 89), customer: { name: "", billingAddress: "", shippingAddress: "", email: "", phoneNumber: "", }, items: [], }; export const InvoiceNew = () => { const [invoice, setInvoice] = useState([]); const [itemList, setItemList] = useState([]); const grandTotal = itemList .map((item) => +item.totalPrice) .reduce((prevVal, curVal) => prevVal + curVal, 0); const gst = +((grandTotal / 100) * 5); const pst = +((grandTotal / 100) * 6); const totalAfterTax = (grandTotal + gst + pst).toFixed(2); const addItem = () => { const qty = +document.getElementById("qty-inp").value; const descript = document.getElementById("des-inp").value; const cost = +document.getElementById("cost-inp").value; const serviceOpt = document.getElementById("serv").value; setItemList([ ...itemList, { id: itemList.length, serviceType: serviceOpt, quantity: qty, price: cost, description: descript, totalPrice: (qty * cost).toFixed(2), }, ]); }; return (

INVOICE

Living Skies Window Tint 160C 16th Street West, Prince Albert, SK, S6V 3V3

Invoice Date

BILL TO

SHIP TO

QTY

DESCRIPTION

UNIT COST

{itemList.map((item, id) => ( ))}
PST: ${pst.toFixed(2)} GST/HST: ${gst.toFixed(2)} GRAND TOTAL: ${totalAfterTax}
); };
